pageContext.claim: “[Democrats] want to spend $99 trillion to redo buildings all over the United States. I said what about China? What about Russia? What about India?”
pageContext.analysis: It’s no clear where Trump got this figure. Democrats’s Green New Deal calls for "upgrading all existing buildings in the United States and building new buildings to achieve maximum energy efficiency," but they are not proposing spending $99 trillion to accomplish this goal.
